anya-e0703n:23_0: Dīpaṅkarañhi sambuddhaṃ, passitvā no jino purā;
anya-e0703n:24_0: Lokaṃ dukkhā pamocetuṃ, bodhāya paṇidhiṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:26_0: Tato tañceva sambuddhaṃ, koṇḍaññaṃ maṅgalaṃ muniṃ;
anya-e0703n:42_0: Uttamo gotamo buddho, satte dukkhā pamocayi.
anya-e0703n:47_0: Sattāhāni tahiṃ satta, so vimuttisukhaṃ paraṃ;
anya-e0703n:51_0: Tattha vassa vasanto’va, saṭṭhiṃ arahataṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:54_0: Vinetvā ca tato tiṃsa-sahā ye bhaddavaggiye.
anya-e0703n:68_0: Sāsanujjotanaṃ ṭhānaṃ, laṃkā ñātā jinena hi;
anya-e0703n:69_0: Yakkhapuṇṇāya laṅkāya, yakkhā nibbā siyāti ca.
anya-e0703n:83_0: Te bhayaṭṭhā’bhayaṃ yakkhā, ayācuṃ abhayaṃ jinaṃ;
anya-e0703n:84_0: Jino abhayado āha, yakkhe te’ti bhayaddīte.
anya-e0703n:86_0: Yakkhā bhayaṃ vo dukkhañca, harissāmi idaṃ ahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:87_0: Tumhe nisajjaṭhānaṃ me, samaggā detha no idha.
anya-e0703n:89_0: Āhu te sugataṃ yakkhā, dema mārisa te idha;
anya-e0703n:90_0: Sabbepi sakalaṃ dīpaṃ, dehi no abhayaṃ tuvaṃ.
anya-e0703n:92_0: Bhayaṃ sītaṃ tamaṃ tesaṃ, hantvā taṃ dinnabhūmiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n:93_0: Cammakkhandhaṃ attharitvā, tatthā’ sīno jino tato.
anya-e0703n:96_0: Ghammābhibhūtā te bhītā, ṭhitā ante samantato.
anya-e0703n:98_0: Giridīpaṃ tato nātho, rammaṃ tesaṃ idhā’nayi;
anya-e0703n:99_0: Tesu tattha paviṭṭhesu, yathāṭhāne ṭhapesi ca.
anya-e0703n:101_0: Nātho taṃ saṃkhipi dhammaṃ, tadā devā samāgamuṃ;
anya-e0703n:102_0: Tasmiṃ samāgame tesaṃ, satthā dhamma madesayi.
anya-e0703n:105_0: Saraṇesu ca sīlesu, ṭhitā āsuṃ asaṃkhiyā.
anya-e0703n:111_0: Pāṇimatteadā kese, tassa pāṇa hito jino.
anya-e0703n:143_0: Bodhito pañcame vasse, vasaṃ jetavane jino.
anya-e0703n:161_0: Datvā kālakatā nāgī, mātulena tathā hi so.
anya-e0703n:172_0: Devo hi so nāgadīpe, manusso’nantare bhave;
anya-e0703n:182_0: Idaṃ ṭhāna hitatthañca, taṃ sarukkhaṃ idhānayi.
anya-e0703n:185_0: Tamaṃ tamonudo tesaṃ, nāgānaṃ hiṃsanaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:188_0: Te disvā sugataṃ tuṭṭhā, pāde vandiṃsu satthuno.
anya-e0703n:191_0: Ubho’pi te patītā taṃ, pallaṅkaṃ munino aduṃ.
anya-e0703n:200_0: Kalyāṇiyaṃ nāgarājā, yuddhaṃ kātuṃ tahiṃ gato.
anya-e0703n:205_0: Mahatī anukampāno, katā nātha tayā ayaṃ;
anya-e0703n:208_0: Anukampā mahī pite, visuṃ hotu mahodaya;
anya-e0703n:218_0: Taṃ bhavissati votātā, hitāya ca sukhāya ca.
anya-e0703n:230_0: Bodhito aṭṭhame vasse, vasaṃ jetavane jino;
anya-e0703n:246_0: Uggantvā sumane kūṭe, padaṃ dassesi nāyako.
anya-e0703n:266_0: Evaṃ laṅkāya nātho, hitamamitamatī āyatiṃ pekkhamāno;
anya-e0703n:280_0: Rojo ca vararojo ca, tathā kalyāṇakā duve;
anya-e0703n:284_0: Mucalindo sāgaro ceva, sāgaro deva vanāmako.
anya-e0703n:286_0: Bharato bhagīratho ceva, ruci ca suruci pica;
anya-e0703n:287_0: Patāpo mahāpatāpo, panādā ca tathā duve.
anya-e0703n:289_0: Sudassano ca neru ca, tathā eva duve duve;
anya-e0703n:295_0: Tato satañca rājano, chappaññāsa ca saṭṭhi ca;
anya-e0703n:296_0: Caturāsīti sahassāni, chattiṃsā ca tato pare.
anya-e0703n:298_0: Dvattiṃsa aṭṭhavīsā ca, dvāvīsati tato pare;
anya-e0703n:301_0: Nava satta dvādasa ca, pañcavīsa tatopare;
anya-e0703n:302_0: Pañcavīsaṃ dvādasa ca, dvādasañca navā pica.
anya-e0703n:307_0: Soḷasa yāva okkātaṃ, paputtā rāsito ime;
anya-e0703n:308_0: Visuṃ visuṃ pure rajjaṃ, kamato anusāsisuṃ.
anya-e0703n:311_0: Nipuro candīmā candaṃ-mukho ca sivi sañjayo.
anya-e0703n:314_0: Sīhassaro ca iccete, tassa putta pa puttakā.
anya-e0703n:317_0: Putta pa putta rājāno, jayaseno tadantimo.
anya-e0703n:325_0: Añjano cā’tha kaccānā, āsuṃ tassa sutā duve;
anya-e0703n:329_0: Añjanassa duve dhītā, māyā cātha pajāpati.
anya-e0703n:331_0: Puttā duve daṇḍapāṇī, suppabuddho ca sākiyo;
anya-e0703n:332_0: Pañca puttā duve dhītā, āsuṃ sīhahanussare.
anya-e0703n:335_0: Amitā pamitācā’ti, ime pañca imā duve.
anya-e0703n:341_0: Suddhodana mahārañño, putto māyāya so jino.
anya-e0703n:344_0: Evaṃ pavatte sañjāto, sabba khatthiya muddhani.
anya-e0703n:350_0: Ubhinnaṃ pitaro cāpi, sahāyāeva te ahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:355_0: Padahitvāna chabbassaṃ, bodhiṃ patvā kamena ca;
anya-e0703n:359_0: Abhisitto mahāpañño, patto rajjassa tassa tu.
anya-e0703n:362_0: Dvāpaññāseva vassāni, rajjaṃ kāresi so pana.
anya-e0703n:371_0: Pacchā so kārayī rajjaṃ, vassāni catuvīsati.
anya-e0703n:384_0: Ṭhatvā sabbāni kiccāni, katvā lokassa sabbathā.
anya-e0703n:390_0: Khattiyā brāhmaṇā vassā, suddhā devā tatheva ca.
anya-e0703n:411_0: Sammanni kātuṃ saṃgītiṃ, sā na sakkā hi taṃ vinā.
anya-e0703n:435_0: Rājā katthāti pucchitvā, vuttaṭhānamhi tehi so.
anya-e0703n:440_0: Sabbathā maṇḍayitvā taṃ, attharāpesi tattha so;
anya-e0703n:449_0: Rājā’rocayi therānaṃ, kammaṃ no niṭṭhitaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:452_0: Sve sannipāto ānanda, sekhena gamanaṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:453_0: Na yuttante sadatthe tvaṃ, appamatto tato bhava.
anya-e0703n:455_0: Iccevaṃ codito thero, katvāna vīriyaṃ samaṃ;
anya-e0703n:458_0: Vassānaṃ dutiye māse, dutiye divase pana;
anya-e0703n:459_0: Rucire maṇḍape tasmiṃ, therā sannipatiṃsu te.
anya-e0703n:504_0: Te yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā, therā sabbepi nibbutā.
anya-e0703n:535_0: Kāḷāso ko tassa putto, aṭṭhavīsati kārayi.
anya-e0703n:547_0: Taṃ sutvāna yasatthero, evaṃ vajjīsu cārikaṃ.
anya-e0703n:555_0: Na kappate taṃ mā detha, iti thero savārayi;
anya-e0703n:558_0: Yācitvā anudūtaṃ so, saha tena puraṃ gato;
anya-e0703n:564_0: Thero uggamma nabhasā, gantvā kosambiyaṃ tato;
anya-e0703n:573_0: Bhikkhavo sannipatitā, sabbe tattha tato tato;
anya-e0703n:577_0: Taṃ kālapamukhaṃ ñatvā, passituṃ nikkhamiṃsu taṃ.
anya-e0703n:579_0: Thero tammantanaṃ sutvā, vesāliṃ gantumeva so;
anya-e0703n:600_0: Upecca taṃ mahābrahmā, dhamme niṭṭhāti abravi;
anya-e0703n:601_0: Niccaṃ dhamme ṭhitattaṃ so, attano tassa abravi.
anya-e0703n:604_0: Thero na gaṇhi tappakkha-gāhī sissaṃ paṇāmayī.
anya-e0703n:606_0: Vesāliṃ te tato gantvā, tato pupphapuraṃ gatā;
anya-e0703n:609_0: Satthussa no gandhakuṭiṃ, gopayanto mayaṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:619_0: Navutiñca sahassāni, ahu taṃ vatthu santiyā.
anya-e0703n:622_0: Thero sabbepi bhikkhū te, vesālimāgamuṃ tato.
anya-e0703n:627_0: Pesetvā te mahīpālo, taṃ rattiṃ supinenaso;
anya-e0703n:630_0: Atibhīto ahu rājā, tamassā setu māgamā;
anya-e0703n:633_0: Bhāriyaṃ te kataṃ kammaṃ, dhammike’yye khamāpaya;
anya-e0703n:634_0: Pakkho tesaṃ bhavitvā tvaṃ, kuru sāsanapaggahaṃ.
anya-e0703n:636_0: Evaṃ kate sotthi tuyhaṃ, hessatīti apakkami;
anya-e0703n:642_0: Khamāpetvā dhammike te, bhikkhū sabbe mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:646_0: Datvā ca tesaṃ ārakkhaṃ, agamāsi sakaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n:648_0: Nicchetuṃ tāni vatthūni, saṅgho sannipatī tadā;
anya-e0703n:652_0: Ubbhāhikāya taṃ vatthuṃ, sametuṃ nicchayaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:655_0: Ubbhāhikāya sammanni, bhikkhū taṃ vatthu santiyā.
anya-e0703n:668_0: Daharenā’ji te nettha, paññatte āsane subhe;
anya-e0703n:671_0: Tesu vatthūsu ekekaṃ, kamato revato mahā;
anya-e0703n:672_0: Thero theraṃ sabbakāmiṃ, pucchi pucchāsu kovido.
anya-e0703n:675_0: Sabbāni tāni vatthūni, na kappantīti suttato.
anya-e0703n:692_0: Vāsabhagāmiko ceva, sumano ca duve pana.
anya-e0703n:695_0: Aṭṭha therā’pi dhaññā te, diṭṭhapubbā tathāgataṃ.
anya-e0703n:709_0: Pubbe kataṃ tathā eva, dhammaṃ pacchā ca bhāsitaṃ;
anya-e0703n:710_0: Ādāya niṭṭhapesuṃ taṃ, etaṃ māsehi aṭṭhahi.
anya-e0703n:741_0: Vajjīputtakabhikkhū ca, duve jātā ime khalu.
anya-e0703n:747_0: Dhammaguttiyabhikkhū ca, jātā khalu ime duve.
anya-e0703n:750_0: Jātā saṅkantikā bhikkhū, suttavādā tato pana.
anya-e0703n:752_0: Theravādena saha te, honti dvādasi’mepi ca;
anya-e0703n:753_0: Pubbe vuttachavādā ca, iti aṭṭhārasā khilā.
anya-e0703n:769_0: Nava nandā tato āsuṃ, kameneva narādhipā;
anya-e0703n:781_0: Bindusārasutā āsuṃ, sataṃ eko ca vissutā;
anya-e0703n:784_0: Vemātike bhātaro so, hantvā ekūnakaṃ sataṃ;
anya-e0703n:794_0: Yojane yojane āṇā, niccaṃ pavattitā ahu.
anya-e0703n:797_0: Devā devo akā tehi, saṃvibhāgaṃ janassaca.
anya-e0703n:821_0: Akaṃsu mūsikā tehi, bhattaṃ rājakule ahu.
anya-e0703n:836_0: Bhojesi sopi teyeva, tīṇi vassāni bhojayi.
anya-e0703n:848_0: Sumanassa kumārassa, putto so hi kumārako.
anya-e0703n:853_0: Katvā puraṃ sakāyattaṃ, mate pitari bhātaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:854_0: Ghātetvā jeṭṭhakaṃ rajjaṃ, aggahesi pure vare.
anya-e0703n:862_0: Tadahe’va varaṃ puttaṃ, vijāyitvā sutassa sā;
anya-e0703n:865_0: Disvā taṃ jeṭṭhacaṇḍālo, attano sāminiṃ viya;
anya-e0703n:868_0: Taṃ mahāvaruṇo thero, tadā disvā kumārakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:880_0: Pubbe kira tayo āsuṃ, bhātaro madhu vāṇijā;
anya-e0703n:881_0: Eko madhuṃ vikkiṇāti, āharanti madhuṃ duve.
anya-e0703n:887_0: Titthaṃ jalatthaṃ gacchanti, ekā ceṭī tamaddasa.
anya-e0703n:890_0: Eso madhvāpaṇo bhante, tattha gacchā’ti abravi.
anya-e0703n:892_0: Tattha pattassa buddhassa, vāṇijo so pasādavā;
anya-e0703n:896_0: Disvā madhuṃ pasanno so, evaṃ paṇidahī tadā.
anya-e0703n:899_0: Ākāse yojane āṇā, bhūmiyaṃ yojaneti ca.
anya-e0703n:901_0: Bhātare āgate āha, edisassa madhuṃ adaṃ;
anya-e0703n:902_0: Anumodatha tumhe taṃ, tumhākañca yato madhu.
anya-e0703n:912_0: Āpaṇā desikaṃ yātu, devittaṃ tassa patthayi;
anya-e0703n:918_0: Caṇḍālavādī caṇḍāla-gāme āsi yato tu so;
anya-e0703n:919_0: Patthesi mokkhaṃ mokkhañca, satta vassova pāpuṇi.
anya-e0703n:921_0: Niviṭṭhapemo tasmiṃ so, rājā’ti turito tato;
anya-e0703n:922_0: Pakkosāpesi taṃ so tu, santavuttī upāgami.
anya-e0703n:928_0: Ajjā’yaṃ sāmaṇero me, ghare hessati sāmiko.
anya-e0703n:930_0: Ālambitvā karaṃ rañño, so pallaṅke samāruhi;
anya-e0703n:933_0: Disvā tathā nisinnaṃ taṃ, asoko so mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:940_0: Taṃ sutvā bhūmipālo so, pasanno jinasāsane.
anya-e0703n:942_0: Aṭṭha te niccabhattāni, dammi tātā’ti āha taṃ;
anya-e0703n:943_0: Upajjhāyassa me rāja, tāni dammīti āha so.
anya-e0703n:945_0: Puna aṭṭhasu dinnesu, tāna’dā cariyassa so;
anya-e0703n:951_0: Sahatthā tappito raññā, dhammaṃ desiya bhūpatiṃ;
anya-e0703n:956_0: Tato rājā pasanno so, diguṇena dine dine;
anya-e0703n:966_0: Gharaṃ netvāna bhojetvā, datvā sāmaṇakaṃ bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:981_0: Paccekaṃ satasahassaṃ, so dāpesi dine dine.
anya-e0703n:990_0: Te piṭakānaṃ therānaṃ, saṭṭhiye’kaṃ dine dine.
anya-e0703n:1008_0: Rūpaṃ anantañāṇassa, dassehi mama bho iti.
anya-e0703n:1014_0: Taṃ disvā’ti pasādassa, vimhayassa ca pūrito.
anya-e0703n:1016_0: Etena nimmitaṃ rūpaṃ, īdisaṃ kīdisaṃ nukho;
anya-e0703n:1022_0: Evaṃ mahānubhāvo ca, saddho cāpi mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:1023_0: Thero ca moggaliputto, diṭṭhā pubbe vasīhi te.
anya-e0703n:1040_0: Upaddavo sāsanassa, na sambhossāma taṃ mayaṃ.
anya-e0703n:1048_0: Kāle tumhesu eko taṃ, pabbājetu kumārakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1063_0: Vedesu gaṇṭhiṭhānāni, pucchi so tāni byākari.
anya-e0703n:1066_0: Sabbe dhammā osaranti, ekadhammo hi ko nu so.
anya-e0703n:1068_0: Iccāha nāmaṃ sandhāya, thero māṇavako tu so;
anya-e0703n:1071_0: Dehīti āha so āha, dema no vesadhārino;
anya-e0703n:1072_0: Guruṃ āpucchi mantatthaṃ, mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā.
anya-e0703n:1089_0: Sagaṇaṃ dāsakaṃ theraṃ, tattha disvā pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n:1090_0: Pabbajjaṃ yāci so āha, tavā’puccha guruṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:1120_0: Pāhesuṃ saṅghavacanaṃ, vuṭṭhāya sa tahiṃ agā.
anya-e0703n:1122_0: Kumāro pucchi kiṃ bhante, nālapitthāti āha so;
anya-e0703n:1123_0: Bhuñjimha bhuñjitabbanti, āha bhojetha no api.
anya-e0703n:1125_0: Āha amhādise jāhe, sakkā bhojayituṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:1134_0: Ñatvā tissa paṭisandhiṃ, tato pabhuti siggavo;
anya-e0703n:1135_0: Thero so sattavassāni, taṃ gharaṃ upasaṅkami.
anya-e0703n:1138_0: Alattha aṭṭhame vasse, gacchāti vacanaṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:1141_0: Kiñci laddhaṃ ghare noti, pucchi āmāti so’bravi.
anya-e0703n:1143_0: Gharaṃ gantvāna pucchitvā, dutiye divase tato;
anya-e0703n:1146_0: Therassa vacanaṃ sutvā, so pasannamano dvijo;
anya-e0703n:1150_0: Bhojāpesi dijo niccaṃ, nisīdāpiya taṃ ghare.
anya-e0703n:1159_0: Tasmā so tassa pallaṅko, vāsayitvā lagīyati.
anya-e0703n:1162_0: Tassa taṃ āsanaṃ tassa, paññapesi ghare jano.
anya-e0703n:1167_0: Thero māṇava kiṃ mantaṃ, jānāsīti tamabravi;
anya-e0703n:1168_0: Tameva pucchaṃ therassa, pacchā rocesi māṇavo.
anya-e0703n:1179_0: Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhisati na uppajjissati;
anya-e0703n:1182_0: Taṃ cittayamake pañhaṃ, pucchi thero visārado;
anya-e0703n:1183_0: Andhakāro viya ahu, tassa so tamavoca so.
anya-e0703n:1185_0: Bhikkhuko nāma mantoti, buddha mantoti so bravi;
anya-e0703n:1186_0: Dehīti vutte novesa-dhārino dammi taṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:1192_0: Sotāphattiphalaṃ patto, thero ñatvāna taṃ tathā.
anya-e0703n:1204_0: Ekāhaṃ uparājā so, adakkhi migavaṃ gato;
anya-e0703n:1210_0: Attano cintitaṃ rañño, ārocesi gharaṃ gato;
anya-e0703n:1211_0: Saññāpetuṃ tu sattāhaṃ, rajjaṃ tassa adāsi so.
anya-e0703n:1213_0: Anubhohi ime rajjaṃ, sattāhaṃ tvaṃ kumāraka;
anya-e0703n:1221_0: Sattāhā’haṃ marissaṃti, tvaṃ na kīḷi ime kathaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1224_0: Iccevaṃ bhākarā vutto, sāsanasmiṃ pasīdi so;
anya-e0703n:1230_0: Ayaṃ thero viyā’hampi, pabbajja jina sāsane;
anya-e0703n:1231_0: Viharissaṃ kadā raññe, iti cintayi paññavā.
anya-e0703n:1241_0: Taṃ iddhiṃ uparājā so, disvā’tīva pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n:1273_0: Janena paribhuttesu, ṭhānesu ca tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:1282_0: Pure bheriṃ carāpesi, sattame divase ito;
anya-e0703n:1306_0: Tasmiṃ samāgame āsuṃ, asīti bhikkhukoṭi yo;
anya-e0703n:1310_0: Khiṇāsavā bhikkhuniyo, sahassaṃ āsu tāsu tu.
anya-e0703n:1319_0: Passi sabbe vihāre ca, nānāpūjā vibhūsite.
anya-e0703n:1321_0: Atīva tuṭṭho te disvā, saṅghaṃ pucchi nisīdiya;
anya-e0703n:1324_0: Thero so moggaliputto, rañño pañhaṃ viyākari;
anya-e0703n:1327_0: Taṃ sutvā vacanaṃ bhiyyo, tuṭṭho rājā apucchi taṃ;
anya-e0703n:1328_0: Buddhasāsana dāyādo, hoti kho mādiso iti.
anya-e0703n:1347_0: Pabbajissatha kiṃ tātā, pabbajjā mahatī matā;
anya-e0703n:1348_0: Pituno vacanaṃ sutvā, pitaraṃ te abhāsisuṃ.
anya-e0703n:1350_0: Ajjeva pabbajissāma, sace tvaṃ deva icchasi;
anya-e0703n:1360_0: Pabbajjā pesi samahaṃ, saṅgha mittañca dhītaraṃ.
anya-e0703n:1366_0: Pabbajjā sikkhādānañca, tassā ca tadahu ahu.

anya-e0703n:2379_0: Gantvā taṃ dhumarakkhaṃ so, tamāruyha mahabbalo;

anya-e0703n:2554_0: Ekā kusumā yaṭṭhītu, kusumāni tahiṃ pana;

anya-e0703n:2563_0: Muttāsamudā uggantvā, tīre vaṭṭi viya ṭhitā;
anya-e0703n:2570_0: Tāni disvā patīto so, rājā iti vicintayi.
anya-e0703n:2575_0: Devānaṃ piyatisso ca, dhammāsoko ca te ime;
anya-e0703n:2579_0: Dijaṃ amaccaṃ gaṇataṃ, rājā te caturo jane.

anya-e0703n:2584_0: Maṇijātī ca tisso tā, tisso ca rathayaṭṭhiyo;

anya-e0703n:2588_0: Sukhena titthaṃ laddhāna, sattāhena tato puna.

anya-e0703n:2599_0: Tesaṃ anappake bhoge, datvā vāsagharāni ca;
anya-e0703n:2620_0: Ahaṃ buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;
anya-e0703n:2633_0: Oruyha kūpaṃ passiṃsu, patvā dvādasiyaṃ idha.
anya-e0703n:2658_0: Pesesi kattike māse, tete there tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:2670_0: Suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ there dve, soṇamuttara meva ca.
anya-e0703n:2688_0: Vātā mahantā vāyanti, megho gajjati vassati.
anya-e0703n:2696_0: Sabbaṃ taṃ iddhiyā thero, paṭibāhiya bhiṃsanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2699_0: Sadeva kopi ce loko, āgantvā tāsayeyya maṃ;
anya-e0703n:2700_0: Na me paṭibalo assa, janetuṃ bhayabheravaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2702_0: Sace’pi tvaṃ mahiṃ sabbaṃ, sasamuddaṃ sapabbataṃ;
anya-e0703n:2714_0: Paṇḍako nāma yakkho tu, saddhiṃhārita yakkhiyā;
anya-e0703n:2720_0: Karotha mettaṃ sattesu, vasantu manujā sukhaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2774_0: Gantvā catūhi therehi, desesi majjhimo isi;
anya-e0703n:2784_0: Suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ agamā, tasmiṃ tu samaye pana.
anya-e0703n:2794_0: Iti cintiya māretuṃ, sā yuvā upasaṅkamuṃ;

anya-e0703n:2804_0: Idaṃ imehi uddhanti, mantvā bhītā palāyisā.
anya-e0703n:2809_0: Saraṇesu ca sīlesu, aṭṭhaṃsu bahavo janā;
anya-e0703n:2845_0: Sampatvā mataraṃ passi, devī disvā piyaṃ sutaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2851_0: So asoka kumāro hi, ujjenīgamanā purā.
anya-e0703n:2853_0: Vedise nagare vāsaṃ, upagantvā tahiṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2856_0: Saṃvāsaṃ tāya kappesi, gabbhaṃ gaṇhiya tena sā;
anya-e0703n:2857_0: Ujjeniyaṃ kumāraṃ taṃ, mahindaṃ janayī subhaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2860_0: Tasmiṃ kāle vasati sā, vedise nagare tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:2862_0: Thero tattha nisīditvā, kālaññū iti cintayi;
anya-e0703n:2877_0: Therena deviyā dhammaṃ, sutvā desitameva tu;
anya-e0703n:2883_0: Saddhiṃ tena gahaṭṭhena, na rato ñātihetunā;

anya-e0703n:2932_0: Te disvā abravī rājā, “kadā” me āgatā iti;

anya-e0703n:2945_0: Puṭṭho puṭṭho viyākāsi, taṃtaṃ pañhaṃ mahīpati.
anya-e0703n:2947_0: Rukkhoyaṃ rājakinnāmo, añño nāma ayaṃ taru;
anya-e0703n:2948_0: Imaṃ muñciya attha’mbo, santi ambatarū bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:2951_0: Santi bhante bahu rukkhā, anambāpana te taru.
anya-e0703n:2953_0: Aññe ambe anambe ca, muñciya’tthi mahīruhā;
anya-e0703n:2956_0: Santi te ñātakā rāja, santi bhante bahujjanā;
anya-e0703n:2957_0: Santi aññātakā rāja, santi te ñātito bahū.
anya-e0703n:2959_0: Ñātake te ca aññe ca, muñciya’ññopi atthi nu;
anya-e0703n:2969_0: “Na bhuñjissa”nti dāni me, iti janammi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:2972_0: Na bhuñjāma idānī’ti, vutte kālañca pucchiso.
anya-e0703n:2975_0: Tuvaṃ gaccha mahārāja, vasissāma mayaṃ idha.
anya-e0703n:2977_0: Evaṃ sati kumāro’yaṃ, amhehi saha gacchatu;
anya-e0703n:2981_0: Idāni pabbajessāma, imaṃ tvaṃ gaccha bhūmipa.
anya-e0703n:2983_0: Pāto rathaṃ pesayissaṃ, tumhe tattha ṭhitā puraṃ;
anya-e0703n:2992_0: Thero taṃ gāmasīmāyaṃ, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe akā;
anya-e0703n:2996_0: Sumanaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ taṃ, thero āmantayī tato.

anya-e0703n:3017_0: Bahū nāgā supaṇṇā ca, saraṇesu patiṭṭhayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:3022_0: Rājā pabhā te pāhesi, rathaṃ sārathi so gato;
anya-e0703n:3025_0: Nā’rohāma rathaṃ gaccha, gacchāma tava pacchato;
anya-e0703n:3043_0: Tadantare sārathi so, there disvā tahiṃ ṭhite;

anya-e0703n:3116_0: Tato therā nikkhamiṃsu, “yāma taṃ pabbataṃ” iti;

anya-e0703n:3899_0: Icchāha sāmaṇero so, sumano taṃ sumānasaṃ.
anya-e0703n:3904_0: Ehi tvaṃ bhadra sumana, gantvā pupphapuraṃ varaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3905_0: Ayyakaṃ te mahārājaṃ, evaṃ no vacanaṃ vada.
anya-e0703n:3910_0: Munino dhātuyo dehi, pattaṃ bhuttañca satthunā;
anya-e0703n:3913_0: Pattapūrā gahetvā tā, gantvā devapuraṃ varaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3914_0: Sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ taṃ, evaṃ no vacanaṃ vada.
anya-e0703n:3919_0: Dāṭhaṃ tvameva pūjehi, akkhakaṃ dehi satthuno;
anya-e0703n:3937_0: Taṃ dhātuṃ dhātupattañca, ādāya sumano tato;
anya-e0703n:3943_0: Ṭhapesi dhātuyo sabbā, thero tattheva pabbate;
anya-e0703n:3944_0: Missakaṃ pabbataṃ tasmā, āhu cetiya pabbataṃ.

anya-e0703n:3952_0: Sirasmiṃ me patiṭṭhātu, āgamma saha dhātuko;
anya-e0703n:3953_0: Iti rājā vicintesi, cintitaṃ taṃ tathā ahu.
anya-e0703n:3958_0: Haṭṭho hattī kuñcanādaṃ, akā kampittha medinī;
anya-e0703n:3962_0: Dakkhiṇena ca dvārena, nikkhamitvā tato puna.
anya-e0703n:3970_0: Manussadevo devehi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ rakkhitaṃ suciṃ;
anya-e0703n:3974_0: Nāgo na icchitaṃ rājā, theraṃ pucchittha taṃ manaṃ.
anya-e0703n:3977_0: Dhātuoropanaṃ tena, na iṭṭhamī’ti so bravi.

anya-e0703n:4036_0: Akāsi tasmā sā dhātu, tadā taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ.

anya-e0703n:4047_0: Taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā, pasīdiṃsu jane janā;

anya-e0703n:4059_0: Evaṃ purā bāhirā ca, sabbe pabbajitā tadā;

anya-e0703n:4066_0: Sabbe janapadā ceva, pujā’kaṃsu visuṃ visuṃ.
anya-e0703n:4093_0: Sakkhissāmi ahaṃ deva, ānetuṃ taṃ duve tato;

anya-e0703n:4127_0: Gantvā pitusamīpaṃ sā, therī theramataṃ bravī.

anya-e0703n:4141_0: Bhante laṃkaṃ mahābodhi, pesetabbā nu kho iti;
anya-e0703n:4145_0: Ābhāsi rañño taṃ sutvā, tussitvā dharaṇīpati.
anya-e0703n:4219_0: Evaṃ satena mūlānaṃ, tattha sā gandhakaddame;
anya-e0703n:4231_0: Sayaṃ nādehi tūriyānaṃ, devesu mānusesu ca;
anya-e0703n:4243_0: Rājā oruyha pīṭhamhā, taṃ sattāhaṃ tahiṃ vasaṃ;
anya-e0703n:4259_0: Nānāpūjāhi sattāhaṃ, puna tattheva so vasi.
anya-e0703n:4267_0: Pūjento taṃ dinaṃyeva, upanetvā sakaṃ puraṃ;
anya-e0703n:4329_0: Eva mevā’bhi pūjetu, rājā rajjena me sakhā”.
anya-e0703n:4331_0: Idaṃ vatvā mahārājā, tīre pañjaliko ṭhito;
anya-e0703n:4369_0: Tasmiṃṭhāne katā sālā, pakā setuṃ tamabbhutaṃ;
anya-e0703n:4396_0: Therassa sutvā kāretvā, saññāṇāni tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:4400_0: Ṭhapāpetvā mahābodhiṃ, ṭhānesu tesu tesu ca.
anya-e0703n:4421_0: Uggantvāna ṭhitā muñci, chabbaṇṇā rasmiyo subhā.
anya-e0703n:4444_0: Sattāhā tikkame meghā, sabbe apagamiṃsu te;
anya-e0703n:4445_0: Mahābodhi ca dissittha, chabbaṇṇā raṃsiyopi ca.
anya-e0703n:4451_0: Tivakka brāhmaṇo ceva, dīpavāsī janāpi ca.
anya-e0703n:4469_0: Mahābodhi ṭhita ṭhāne, nāvāyo rohane tadā.
anya-e0703n:4493_0: Sasaṅghā saṅghamittā sā, mahātherī tahiṃ vasi.
anya-e0703n:4499_0: Ekasmiṃ piya mekasmiṃ, arittaṃ tehi teviduṃ.
anya-e0703n:4508_0: Hatthiṃ tattharataṃ ñatvā, akaṃsu tattha āḷhakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:4510_0: Atheka divasaṃ hatthī, nagaṇhi kabaḷāni so;
anya-e0703n:4511_0: Dīpappasādakaṃ theraṃ, rājā so pucchitaṃ mataṃ.
anya-e0703n:4516_0: Sadhātukaṃ tattha thūpaṃ, thūpassa gharameva ca;
anya-e0703n:4529_0: Gantvā tattha gataṃ sutvā, gantvāna tattha vandiya.
anya-e0703n:4532_0: Tassā ñatvā adhippāyaṃ, adhippāya vidū vidū.
anya-e0703n:4556_0: Tato dvādasame vasse, mahesī tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n:4562_0: Tato tu tatiye vasse, sābālā rūpamāninī;
anya-e0703n:4563_0: “Mayāpi ca ayaṃ rājā, mahābodhiṃ ma māyati”.
anya-e0703n:4568_0: Tato ca tutthevassamhi, dhammā soko mahāyaso;
anya-e0703n:4571_0: Devānaṃ piyatisso tu, rājā dhammaguṇe rato;
anya-e0703n:4583_0: Hatthikkhandhe ṭhapetvā tā, dhātuyo idha āhara;
anya-e0703n:4584_0: Iti vutto satherena, tathā āhari dhātuyo.
anya-e0703n:4598_0: Yā yā mahāmahindena, therena vasitā guhā;
anya-e0703n:4634_0: Ayaṃ dīpo ahu ṭhito, vijite tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n:4637_0: Tassa’cca ye taṃ kaniṭṭho, uttiyo iti vissuto;
anya-e0703n:4638_0: Rājaputto aputtaṃ taṃ, rajjaṃ kāresi sādhukaṃ.
anya-e0703n:4644_0: Laṃkāyaso satthu kappo, katvā laṃkāhitaṃ bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:4653_0: Tena taṃ divasaṃ nāma, aṭṭhamiyāti sammataṃ.]
anya-e0703n:4656_0: Gantvāna theraṃ vanditvā kanditvā bahudhā bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:4683_0: Karonto tattha netvā taṃ, kūṭāgāraṃ manoramaṃ.
anya-e0703n:4689_0: Sabbesu ca vihāresu, thūpe kāresi khattiyo.
anya-e0703n:4706_0: Sabbā alaṅkatā laṃkā, therassa viya āsi ca;
anya-e0703n:4713_0: Thūpañca tattha kāresi, uttiyo so mahīpati.
anya-e0703n:4724_0: Dasavassāni so rājā, rajjaṃ kāresi uttiyo;
anya-e0703n:4727_0: Taṃ etaṃ atisāhasaṃ atibalaṃ na vāriyaṃ naro;
anya-e0703n:4729_0: Nibbindo viratiṃ ratiṃ na kurute pāpehi puññehi ca;
anya-e0703n:4738_0: Dasa vassāni kāresi, rajjaṃ sujana sevako.
anya-e0703n:4746_0: Dakkhiṇāya disāyaṃ so, vihāraṃ nagaraṃ gaṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n:4758_0: Pure rajjā ca rajje ca, saṭṭhīvassāni sādhukaṃ;
anya-e0703n:4768_0: Te gahetvā aselo tu, muṭasivassa atrajo.
anya-e0703n:4782_0: Eko putto ca dhītā ca, ahesuṃ tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n:4789_0: Rājā teneva cakkena, sīsaṃ puttassa chedayi.
anya-e0703n:4794_0: Āṇāpetvāna taṃ rājā, kucchiṃ tassa vidāḷiya;
anya-e0703n:4812_0: Thūpaṃ pākatikaṃ katvā, khamāpehī”ti āhu taṃ.
anya-e0703n:4814_0: Te ṭhapetuṃ pañcadasa, pāsāṇe patite tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:4817_0: Akā mahallikā vīhiṃ, so setuṃ ātape khipi;
anya-e0703n:4818_0: Devo akāle vassitvā, tassā vihiṃ atemayi.
anya-e0703n:4820_0: Vīhiṃ gahetvā gantvā sā, ghaṇṭaṃ taṃ samaghaṭṭayi;
anya-e0703n:4833_0: Tatoppabhuti taṃ rajje, divā devo na vassatha.
anya-e0703n:4867_0: Puttaṃ janesi so tassa, bhātu nāma makārayi.
anya-e0703n:4877_0: Yaṭṭhālaya katisso so, tassa putto tadaccaye;
anya-e0703n:4878_0: Hattheva rajjaṃ kāresi, tassa putto’bhayo tathā.
anya-e0703n:4881_0: Tadaccaye tattha rajjaṃ, so akāresi khattiyo.
anya-e0703n:4886_0: Kalyāṇiyaṃ narindo hi, tisso nāmāsi khattiyo;
anya-e0703n:4890_0: Aññattha vasi so deso, tena taṃ nāmako ahu.
anya-e0703n:4893_0: Pāhesi deviyā gantvā, rājadvāre ṭhito tuso.
anya-e0703n:4898_0: Therena saddhiṃ bhuñjitvā, rañño saha viniggame;
anya-e0703n:4904_0: Theraṃ taṃ purisaṃ tañca, mārāpetvāna kodhasā;
anya-e0703n:4908_0: Attano dhītaraṃ yuddhaṃ, deviṃ nāma surupiniṃ.
anya-e0703n:4920_0: Upaṭṭhahi tadā saṅghaṃ, paccayehi catūhi so.
anya-e0703n:4926_0: Ṭhapesi tīṇi pāsāṇe, pāsāṇa phalakāni so.
anya-e0703n:4928_0: Adā pānīya dānañca, vattaṃ saṅghassa cā’kari;
anya-e0703n:4940_0: Tadā tatheva katvā sā, saṅghattherassa santike;
anya-e0703n:4941_0: Nisīdi dhammaṃ desento, thero taṃ idha mabravi.
anya-e0703n:4946_0: Evaṃ vutte tu sā āha, “kiṃ sampatti ayaṃ idha;
anya-e0703n:4947_0: Yesaṃ no dārakā natthi, vañjhāsampatti tena no”.
anya-e0703n:4953_0: “Patthehi mama puttattaṃ, sampattī mahatī hi no”.
anya-e0703n:4955_0: Na icchatīti ñatvāna, tadatthaṃ mahatiṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0703n:4959_0: Nānā bhesajja vatthāni, saṅghe datvā’tha yācitaṃ.
anya-e0703n:4961_0: Patthesi so rājakulaṃ, sā taṃ ṭhānaṃ anekadhā;
anya-e0703n:4965_0: Tassā kucchimhi nibbatti, taṃ jāniya nivattisā.
anya-e0703n:4967_0: Rañño taṃ sāsanaṃ datvā, raññā saha punā’gamā;
anya-e0703n:4973_0: Tasse’vaṃ dohaḷo āhi, mahā puññāya mātuyā;
anya-e0703n:4986_0: Taṃ devī rājino āha, nemitte pucchi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:4991_0: Edisaṃ madhugaṇḍaṃ so, dasseti tassa īdisiṃ;
anya-e0703n:4995_0: Nāvaṃ ñatvāna ācikkhi, rañño janapade naro.
anya-e0703n:4997_0: Rājā deviṃ tahiṃ netvā, maṇḍapamhi susaṅkhate;
anya-e0703n:5001_0: Veḷusumana nāmaṃ taṃ, yodhaṃ tattha niyojayi.
anya-e0703n:5004_0: Gopakena akā mettiṃ, tassa kiccañca sabbadā.
anya-e0703n:5006_0: Tassa vissattha taṃ ñatvā, pātova uppalāna’siṃ;
anya-e0703n:5012_0: Sutvā rājā gahetuṃ taṃ, mahā yodhānapesayi;
anya-e0703n:5021_0: Dohaḷe te ca sā devī, paribhuñji yathāruci;
anya-e0703n:5024_0: Sā devī samaye dhaññaṃ, janayī puttamuttamaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5025_0: Mahārājakule tasmiṃ, ānando ca mahā ahu.
anya-e0703n:5037_0: Kaṇḍulo iti ñāyittha, diṭṭhattā kaṇḍulena so.
anya-e0703n:5049_0: Sabbe te uddhapattañca, cīvaraṃ pārapantu ca.
anya-e0703n:5051_0: Paṭhamaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ pādaṃ, ummāranto ṭhapentu ca;
anya-e0703n:5054_0: Gotamo nāma thero ca, patiggaṇhātu puttakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5055_0: So ca saraṇasikkhā yo, detu” sabbaṃ tathā ahu.
anya-e0703n:5058_0: Datvā saṅghassa pāyāsaṃ, nāmaṃ puttassa kārayi.
anya-e0703n:5064_0: Saṅgamaṃ deviyā kāsi, tena gabbhamagaṇhi sā.
anya-e0703n:5066_0: Kāle jātaṃ sutaṃ rājā, tissanāmaṃ akārayi;
anya-e0703n:5076_0: Mā jīratu kucchigataṃ, idaṃ vo”ti apāpayi.
anya-e0703n:5088_0: Na hessāmā”ti cintetvā, bhāgaṃ bhuñjathi’manti ca.
anya-e0703n:5093_0: Amataṃ viya bhuñjiṃsu, te dve bhāge ubhopi ca;
anya-e0703n:5096_0: Evaṃ vuttetu tisso so, pāṇinā khipi bhojanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5102_0: Pasāritaṅgo sayane, kiṃ nasesi sukhaṃ suta;
anya-e0703n:5142_0: Ummārātikkame nandi, sā chajjati yato tato.
anya-e0703n:5153_0: Damiḷānaṃ khayaṃ disvā, rañño ārocayiṃ sutaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5163_0: Iti gantvā gāmaṇissa, taṃ kumārassa sāvayi.
anya-e0703n:5165_0: Mātuyā mantayitvā so, sakkāraṃ tassa kārayi;
anya-e0703n:5166_0: Sakkato nandimitto so, yodho vasi tadantike.
anya-e0703n:5171_0: Ahu dīghābhayo nāma, rañño’ñña bhariyā suto;
anya-e0703n:5184_0: Rocayuṃ tassa gamanaṃ, na tu mātā pitā pana.
anya-e0703n:5189_0: So taṃ vimaṃsanatthāya, dūre kicce niyojayi;
anya-e0703n:5192_0: Brāhmaṇo kuṇḍalo nāma, vijja te me sahāyako;
anya-e0703n:5195_0: Gantvā taṃ tena dinnāni, bhaṇḍakāni idhā’hara;
anya-e0703n:5196_0: Iti vatvāna bhojetvā, lekhaṃ datvā vissajjayi.
anya-e0703n:5199_0: Pubbaṇheyeva gantvāna, so taṃ brāhmaṇa maddasa.
anya-e0703n:5210_0: Upāgami brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ, puṭṭho tenā’ha so gatiṃ;
anya-e0703n:5214_0: Sace jāneyya eḷāro, imaṃ hatthe karissati.
anya-e0703n:5219_0: Eva mevaṃ likhitvāna, lekhaṃ tassa samappayi;
anya-e0703n:5222_0: Datvā taṃ bhojayitvā ca, pesesī sakhisantikaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5241_0: So sabbaṃ ekato katvā, netvā mātāpitantikaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5245_0: Pabhāte rājaputto taṃ, sutvā tuṭṭhamano ahu.
anya-e0703n:5270_0: Tena so laddhasakkāro, yodho vasi tadantike.
anya-e0703n:5276_0: Karonti keḷiparihāsaṃ, tassa jeṭṭhā cha bhātaro.
anya-e0703n:5279_0: Tassa bhāgaṃ ṭhapetvāna, gantvā tassa nivedayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:5281_0: So gantvā taṃ khaṇaṃyeva, rukkhe imbarasaññite;
anya-e0703n:5282_0: Luñcitvāna samaṃ katvā, bhūmiṃ gantvā nivedayi.
anya-e0703n:5284_0: Gantvāna bhātaro tassa, disvā kammanta mabbhutaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5297_0: Kīḷamāno khipi tadā, so kīḷāguḷake viya.
anya-e0703n:5339_0: Gantvā ubho sakaṃ nāmaṃ, dārakassa akārayuṃ;
anya-e0703n:5340_0: Taṃ vuddhaṃ attano gehe, vāsesi siribhojako.
anya-e0703n:5342_0: Tasse’ko sindhavo posaṃ, kañcinā rohituṃ adā;
anya-e0703n:5343_0: Disvā tu veḷusumanaṃ, ayaṃ arohako mama.
anya-e0703n:5350_0: So assaṃ āruhitvā taṃ, sīghaṃ dhāvayi maṇḍale;
anya-e0703n:5351_0: Maṇḍale sakale asso, ekābaddho adissi so.
anya-e0703n:5356_0: Taṃ disvā parisā sabbā, ukkuṭṭhiṃ sampavattayi;
anya-e0703n:5366_0: Īsakaṃ pana khañjattā, khañjadevoti taṃ viduṃ.
anya-e0703n:5368_0: Migamaṃ gāmavāsīhi, saha gantvāna so tadā;
anya-e0703n:5372_0: Asumha bhūmiṃ cuṇṇeti, tesaṃ aṭṭhīni māṇavo.
anya-e0703n:5380_0: Gantvā saha kumārehi, vihāraṃ so kumārako;
anya-e0703n:5384_0: Ummattā viya āsuṃ te, bhītā sabbepi dārakā.
anya-e0703n:5386_0: Tena so āsi ummāda-phussa devoti pākaṭo;
anya-e0703n:5389_0: Saddavedhi vijjuvedhī, vālavedhī ca so ahu;
anya-e0703n:5396_0: Thale aṭṭhusabhaṃ yāti, jale tu usabhaṃ pana.
anya-e0703n:5411_0: Vahanto paṃsupiṇḍe so, lahuṃ vāpiṃ samāpayi.
anya-e0703n:5413_0: Tena so pākaṭo āsi, tampi ādāya bhūmipo;
anya-e0703n:5414_0: Datvā taṃ tassa sakkāraṃ, gāmaṇissa adāsi taṃ.
anya-e0703n:5431_0: Tathā tepā’nayuṃ yodhe, sabbe sampiṇḍitā tu te;
anya-e0703n:5459_0: Pitā me puriso honto, ne’vaṃ vakkhati teni’daṃ;
anya-e0703n:5463_0: Tāya taṃ bandhayissāmi, nā’ññathā rakkhiyo hi so.
anya-e0703n:5475_0: Sabbe yodhe samānetvā, kāresi sapathaṃ tadā.
anya-e0703n:5478_0: Akaṃsu sapathaṃ sabbe, taṃ yuddhaṃ tena nāgamuṃ.
anya-e0703n:5484_0: Netvā tissa mahārāmaṃ, taṃ saṅghassa nivedayi.
anya-e0703n:5508_0: Taṃ disvā “bhikkhusaṅghassa, kammaṃ” iti nivatti so.
anya-e0703n:5521_0: Thero piyaṅgu dīpaṭṭho, theraṃ tattha niyojayi;
anya-e0703n:5525_0: Saṅghassa bhāgaṃ sambhāgaṃ, rājā patte khipāpayi.
anya-e0703n:5527_0: Sambhāgaṃ khipi tisso ca, sambhāgaṃ vaḷavāpi ca;
anya-e0703n:5531_0: Adā gotamatherassa, so gantvā nabhasā lahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:5534_0: Pañcasatānaṃ so thero, laddhehi tu tadantikā.
anya-e0703n:5536_0: Bhāgehi pattaṃ pūretvā, ākāse khipi rājino;
anya-e0703n:5537_0: Disvā’ gataṃ gahetvā taṃ, tisso bhojisi bhūpatiṃ.
anya-e0703n:5540_0: Sattāhaṃ cumbaṭaṃ katvā, rājā pattaṃ visajjayi.
anya-e0703n:5542_0: Gantvāna so mahāgāmaṃ, samādāya balaṃ puna;
anya-e0703n:5546_0: Dve bhātaro samāgañchuṃ, yujjhamānā raṇe tadā.
anya-e0703n:5549_0: Tathāpi chiddaṃ no disvā, laṅghā petuṃ matiṃakā.
anya-e0703n:5552_0: Tomaraṃ khipi cammaṃva, yathā chijjati piṭṭhiyaṃ.
anya-e0703n:5555_0: Patiṃsu yuddhe yujjhantā, bhijja ceva mahabbalaṃ.
anya-e0703n:5569_0: “Mañce tattha mahārāja”, iti thero avoca taṃ;
anya-e0703n:5570_0: Heṭṭhā mañceti jānitvā, tato nikkhamma bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:5572_0: Samantato vihārassa, rakkhaṃ kārayi taṃ pana;
anya-e0703n:5578_0: Nīyamānantu taṃ ñatvā, idha māha mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:5590_0: Nikkhāmito so bhikkhūhi, tissorāja suto pana;
anya-e0703n:5613_0: Janakkhayaṃ vināyeva, kalaho na bhaveyya no;
anya-e0703n:5614_0: Rājā saṅghassa doseso, bhaṃghe daṇḍaṃ karissati.
anya-e0703n:5644_0: Maṅgalañceva rakkhā ca, bhikkhūnaṃ dassanaṃ hino.
anya-e0703n:5659_0: Yujjhaṃ catūhi mā sehi, katahatthaṃ mahabbalaṃ.
anya-e0703n:5677_0: Gaṇhi khāṇuṃ khāṇugāme, dve tu tambuṇṇame pana.
anya-e0703n:5680_0: Jambucaggahī soso ca, gāmo’hu taṃ tadavhayo.
anya-e0703n:5703_0: Hatthinā nandimitto tu, yasmā yattha ayujjhi so;
anya-e0703n:5704_0: Tasmā tattha tato gāmo, hatthiporoti vuccati.
anya-e0703n:5706_0: Vīmaṃsitvā ubho rājā, vijitaṃ nagaraṃ agā;
anya-e0703n:5712_0: Dvāraṃ thakesuṃ damiḷā, rājā yodhe visajjayi;
anya-e0703n:5713_0: Kaṇṇulo nandimitto ca, suranimilo ca dakkhiṇe.
anya-e0703n:5732_0: Na idaṃ surāpāṇaṃ te, ayodvāra vighāṭanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5735_0: So mānaṃ janayitvāna, koñcaṃ katvā gajuttamo;
anya-e0703n:5739_0: Rājā āruyha hatthiṃ taṃ, kumbhe phusiyapāṇinā.
anya-e0703n:5751_0: Saddhārabāhaṃ taṃ dvāraṃ, bhūmiyaṃ saravaṃ pati.
anya-e0703n:5766_0: Oloki suranimalaṃ, anicchaṃ sopi taṃ pathaṃ.
anya-e0703n:5777_0: Visuṃ visuṃ vīthigatā, damiḷe tattha cuṇṇayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:5780_0: Tatho girilakaṃ gantvā, giriyaṃ damiḷaṃ hani.
anya-e0703n:5803_0: “Suve yuddhaṃ karissāmi”, iti te nicchayaṃ karuṃ.
anya-e0703n:5809_0: Abbhantare koṭṭhake tu, sayaṃ aṭṭhāsi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:5829_0: “Chindā metaṃ saphalakaṃ”, iti cintiya so pana;
anya-e0703n:5830_0: Phalakaṃ hani khaggena, taṃ muñciyi’ tarosayi.
anya-e0703n:5835_0: Saṅkhaṃ dhami phussadevo, senā bhijjittha dāmiḷi;
anya-e0703n:5838_0: Tattha vāpi jalaṃ āsi, hatānaṃ lohitā vilaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5839_0: Tasmā kulatthavā pīti, nāmato vissutaṃ ahu.
anya-e0703n:5850_0: Vijjhāpesi ca dantehi, taṃ hatthiṃ sakahatthinā;
anya-e0703n:5851_0: Tomaraṃ khipi eḷāraṃ, sahatthi tattha so pati.
anya-e0703n:5854_0: Laṃkaṃ ekātapattaṃ so, katvāna pāvisi puraṃ.
anya-e0703n:5856_0: Puramhi bheriṃ cāretvā, samantā yojane jane;
anya-e0703n:5868_0: Vijite nagare bhinne, yodho so dīghajattuko;
anya-e0703n:5877_0: Otiṇṇo so suṇitvāpi, patanaṃ tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n:5884_0: Hatthassa rathayo dhehi, pantīhi ca anunako.
anya-e0703n:5889_0: Pavatte tumūle yuddhe, sannaddho bhalluko tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:5893_0: Senāpi saddhiṃ teneva, paccosakki saniṃ saniṃ.
anya-e0703n:5896_0: Na paccosakki kiṃ etaṃ, phussadevā”ti āha so.
anya-e0703n:5898_0: Jayo no paramo deva, jayabhūmi mayaṃ gajo;
anya-e0703n:5907_0: Mukhaṃ pidhāya khaggena, rājā akkosi taṃ pana;
anya-e0703n:5908_0: “Rañño mukhamhi pātemi”, iti kaṇḍañca so khipi.
anya-e0703n:5910_0: Āhacca so khaggatalaṃ, kaṇḍo papati bhūmiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5913_0: Rañño pacchā nisinno bho, phussadevo mahabbalo;
anya-e0703n:5916_0: Rājānaṃ pādato katvā, patamānassa tassa tu;
anya-e0703n:5917_0: Khipitvā aparaṃ kaṇḍaṃ, vijjhitvā tassa jaṇḍukaṃ.
anya-e0703n:5923_0: Kaṇḍavalliṃ sakaṃ chetvā, pasataṃ lohitaṃ sayaṃ.
anya-e0703n:5925_0: Radhaññā dassesi taṃ disvā, rājā taṃ pucchi“kiṃ”iti;
anya-e0703n:5926_0: Rāja daṇḍo kato meti, so avoca mahīpati.
anya-e0703n:5933_0: Iti vatvā mahārājā, kataññu idha māha ca;
anya-e0703n:5936_0: Ghātetvā damiḷe sabbe, rājā laddhajayo kato;
anya-e0703n:5952_0: Kataṃ akkhobhiṇighātaṃ, saranto na sukhaṃ labhi.
anya-e0703n:5957_0: Āgamma te majjhāyāme, rāja dvāramhi otaruṃ;
anya-e0703n:5964_0: Tamassā sayituṃ amhe, iti rājā punā’hate.
anya-e0703n:5966_0: “Kathaṃ nu bhante assāso, mama hessati yena me;
anya-e0703n:5979_0: Vanditvā te visajjetvā, sayito puna cintayi.
anya-e0703n:5984_0: Adatvā bhikkhusaṅghassa, bhuttaṃ atthi nukho iti;
anya-e0703n:5988_0: Tadatthaṃ daṇḍakammaṃ me, kattabbanti ca cintayi.
anya-e0703n:5990_0: Ete tenekakoṭi idha manujagaṇe ghātite cintayitvā,
anya-e0703n:5991_0: Kāmānaṃ hetu etaṃ manasi ca kayirā sādhu ādīnavaṃ taṃ;
anya-e0703n:5992_0: Sabbesaṃ ghātaniṃ taṃ manasi ca kayirā’ niccataṃ sādhu sādhu,
anya-e0703n:5993_0: Evaṃ dukkhā pamokkhaṃ subhagati mahavā pāpuṇeyyā’cīrenāti.
anya-e0703n:6009_0: Icceva māha taṃ rājā, punappunaṃ nisedhayi;
anya-e0703n:6016_0: Rājā katā bhisekova, mahatā vibhavena so.
anya-e0703n:6030_0: Cāletuṃ taṃ na sakkhiṃsu, kuntaṃ rājādhikārikā;
anya-e0703n:6033_0: Rājā mahantaṃ accheraṃ, disvā taṃ haṭṭhamānaso;
anya-e0703n:6034_0: Vidhāya tattha ārakkhaṃ, pavisitvā puraṃ tato.
anya-e0703n:6039_0: Tīhi vassehi niṭhāsi, vihāro so narissaro;
anya-e0703n:6051_0: Patiggaṇhātu taṃ saṅgho, iti so dakkhiṇodakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:6054_0: Vihāre taṃ samantāpi, mahantaṃ maṇḍapaṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0703n:6066_0: Ante sahassagghanako, sabba saṅgho ca taṃlabhi.
anya-e0703n:6068_0: Yuddhe dāne ca sūrena, sūrinā ratanattaye;
anya-e0703n:6087_0: Tato rājā vicintesi, vissutaṃ sussutaṃ sutaṃ;
anya-e0703n:6114_0: Dibbaṃ vimānaṃ pesetvā, tadā lekhaṃ adātha me”;
anya-e0703n:6120_0: Bharaṇiṃ nāma dāsiṃ so, “niccaṃ dehī”ti abravi;
anya-e0703n:6121_0: Datvā sā tāni sakkaccaṃ, yāvajīvaṃ tato cutā.
anya-e0703n:6138_0: Tāvatiṃsañca gacchantā, disvā theraṃ tameva te;
anya-e0703n:6139_0: Hiṅgulena tadā lekhaṃ, lekhayitvā paṭe tato.
anya-e0703n:6142_0: Saṅgho paṭaṃ gahetvā taṃ, pāhesi rājasantikaṃ.
anya-e0703n:6144_0: Taṃ disvā sumano rājā, āgammārāma muttamaṃ;
anya-e0703n:6168_0: Sahassaṃ tattha pāsādo, gabbhā āsuṃ susaṅkhatā;
anya-e0703n:6184_0: Sajjhumaye candimā ca, tārā ca muttakā mayā.
anya-e0703n:6204_0: Ācāma kumbhisovaṇṇā, uluṅko ca ahu tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:6205_0: Pāsāda paribhogesu, sesesu ca kathā’ vakā.
anya-e0703n:6224_0: Arahanto ca aṭṭhaṃsu, uddhaṃ catūsu bhūmisu.
anya-e0703n:6249_0: Āruyha rattiṃ bhuñjitvā, sayito iti cintayi.
anya-e0703n:6252_0: Na sakkā balimuddhattuṃ, taṃ vajjiya baliṃ ahaṃ.
anya-e0703n:6258_0: Devesu ñatvā taṃ sakko, vissakammāna mabravi.
anya-e0703n:6261_0: Gantvā purā yojanamhi, gambhīra nadī yantike.
anya-e0703n:6263_0: Māpehi iṭṭhikā tattaṃ’, iti sakke na bhāsito;
anya-e0703n:6266_0: Pabhāte luddako tattha, sunakhehi vanaṃ agā;
anya-e0703n:6270_0: Antarahitāya godhāya, iti cidhantasi so tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:6275_0: Tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, piyaṃ janahi tappiyo;
anya-e0703n:6284_0: Suvaṇṇa puṇṇaṃ taṃ bhūmiṃ, disvā saṅgāmavāsikā;
anya-e0703n:6285_0: Suvaṇṇa pāhiṃ ādāya, gantvā rañño nivedayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:6302_0: Nagare vāṇijo eko, ādāya sakaṭe bahū;
anya-e0703n:6308_0: Cāṭippamāṇa taṃ tattha, pakkabhārena nāmi taṃ;
anya-e0703n:6309_0: Disvā pana salaṭṭhiñca, pāsāṇaṭṭhañca taṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e0703n:6311_0: Vaṇṭe taṃ vāsiyā chetvā, dassāma’gganti cintiya;
anya-e0703n:6317_0: Muñjitvā’vāṭa puṇṇaṃ taṃ, yūsaṃ pattehī ādiya;
anya-e0703n:6325_0: Tesaṃ patte gahetvā so, pattāmiñjahi pūriya;
anya-e0703n:6326_0: Adāsi tesaṃ pakkāmuṃ, tayo eko napakkami.
anya-e0703n:6328_0: Rajataṃ tassa dassetuṃ, orohitvā tato hi so;
anya-e0703n:6334_0: Añjasā iminā tvampi, gaccha dānī upāsaka;
anya-e0703n:6335_0: Gantvāna theraṃ passitvā, veyyāvacca mahāsi ca.
anya-e0703n:6337_0: Thero ca leṇadvārena, tassa magga amāpayi;
anya-e0703n:6338_0: Theraṃ vandiya so tena, gacchanto leṇamaddasa.
anya-e0703n:6340_0: Leṇa dvāramhi ṭhatvāna, passitvā rajatampi so;
anya-e0703n:6353_0: Kevaṭṭā tā samekkhitvā, rāsiṃ katvāna ekato.
anya-e0703n:6358_0: Purato uttare passe, satta yojana matthake;
anya-e0703n:6364_0: Te disvā sunakho luddo, agantvā rājasantikaṃ;
anya-e0703n:6371_0: Ete vā rakkhake katvā, sabbāni āharāpayi.
anya-e0703n:6396_0: Mattikā sukhumā tattha, samantā tiṃ sayojane.
anya-e0703n:6426_0: Patiṭṭhāpessaṃ sve ettha, sabbo saṅgho sametuno.
anya-e0703n:6432_0: Cetiya ṭhāna bhūsāya, amacce ca niyojayi.
anya-e0703n:6441_0: Nahāpite nahāpake ca, appake ca bahūtathā.
anya-e0703n:6443_0: Vatthāni gandhamālā ca, annāni madhurāni ca;
anya-e0703n:6470_0: Thero’ sīti sahassāni, bhikkhū ādāya āgamā;
anya-e0703n:6494_0: Cattārīsata sahassāni, sahassāni ca saṭṭhi ca;
anya-e0703n:6498_0: Thero tiṃsa sahassāni, bhikkhū ādāya āgamā.
anya-e0703n:6519_0: Majjhe ṭhapetvā okāsaṃ, rañño aṭṭhaṃsu bhikkhavo.
anya-e0703n:6521_0: Pavisitvā tahiṃ rājā, bhikkhusaṅghaṃ tathā ṭhitaṃ;
anya-e0703n:6543_0: Iti so nāgataṃ passaṃ, mahantattaṃ nivārayi.
anya-e0703n:6555_0: Aṭṭhuttare aṭṭhuttare, vatthānaṃ tu sate pana.
anya-e0703n:6573_0: Vanditvā pūjayitvā ca, suppatito kamena so.
anya-e0703n:6603_0: Saṅgho taṃ nādhivāsesi, anupubbena so pana;
anya-e0703n:6610_0: Satthāhaṃ tattha saṅghassa, tato saṅghaṃ vissajjayi.
anya-e0703n:6612_0: Tato bheriṃ carāpetvā, iṭṭhakā vaḍḍhakī lahuṃ;
anya-e0703n:6615_0: Kathaṃ karissasi ne’ko, pucchito āha bhūpati;
anya-e0703n:6619_0: Tato upaḍḍhupaḍḍhañca, paṃsū dve ammaṇāni ca.
anya-e0703n:6621_0: Āhaṃsu rājā paṭibāhi, caturo tepi vaḍḍhakī;
anya-e0703n:6622_0: Atheko paṇḍito byatto, vaḍḍhakī āha bhūpatiṃ.
anya-e0703n:6630_0: “Kaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ cetiyaṃ taṃ, karissasi tuvaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:6643_0: Iti rājā vicintesi, rattiṃñatvāna taṃ marū.
anya-e0703n:6667_0: Kamena rājā sutvāna, āgato pucchi vaḍḍhakī.
anya-e0703n:6670_0: Ekena mattikāpiṇḍaṃ, denti mayhaṃ ahaṃ pana.
anya-e0703n:6672_0: Ayaṃ āgantuko bhikkhu, ayaṃ nevāsiko iti;
anya-e0703n:6676_0: So balatassa dassesi, so taṃ rañño nivedayi.
anya-e0703n:6682_0: Balattho taṃ nivedesi, tadā taṃ jāni so yati.
anya-e0703n:6691_0: So taṃ tattha niyojesi, kolāhalamahosi ca.
anya-e0703n:6693_0: Rājā sutvāva’ taṃ āha, “ñātuṃ sakkā tamiṭṭhikaṃ”;
anya-e0703n:6694_0: Jānantopi na sakkāti, rājānaṃ āha vaḍḍhakī.
anya-e0703n:6707_0: Rañño sabbaṃ nivedesi, rājā tassa adāpayi;
anya-e0703n:6713_0: Therena saha gantvā so, dissante piyagallake;
anya-e0703n:6719_0: Kulūpagassa therassa, gahitā me ime mayā;
anya-e0703n:6720_0: Vatthayugaṃtu puttassa, sabbe tāni dadāmi vo.
anya-e0703n:6722_0: Iti vatvāna datvā te, gahetvā gacchato pana;
anya-e0703n:6731_0: Ettheva bhatiyā kammaṃ, karitvā itthiyo duve;
anya-e0703n:6751_0: Mahāthūpe kataṃ kammaṃ, tassa āhaṃsu devatā;
anya-e0703n:6752_0: Evaṃ tathāgate heva, pasādo hi mahapphalo.
anya-e0703n:6757_0: Nava vāre citaṃ sabbaṃ, evaṃ osīdayiṃsu te;
anya-e0703n:6766_0: Kataṃ etaṃ mahārāja, na idāni karissate;
anya-e0703n:6775_0: Āharathā”ti yojesi, te gantvā uttaraṃ kuruṃ;
anya-e0703n:6790_0: Aṭṭhārasa rataniko, khandho sākhāssa pañca ca;
anya-e0703n:6796_0: Atha maṅgalikā tassa, khandhe pupphalatāpi ca;
anya-e0703n:6800_0: Suvaṇṇa ghaṇṭāpantīdha, dāmāni ca tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:6860_0: Dahanaṃ agginibbānaṃ, tattha sakkāra meva ca.
anya-e0703n:6868_0: Catuddisaṃ te cattāro, mahārājā ṭhitā ahuṃ;
anya-e0703n:6869_0: Tettiṃsadeva puttā ca, bāttiṃsa ca kumāriyo.
anya-e0703n:6877_0: Padumādigāhakā devā, aññe devā ca nekadhā;
anya-e0703n:6878_0: Ratanagghiya panti ca, dhammacakkāna meva ca.
anya-e0703n:6902_0: Dhātu tassa vicuṇṇitaṃ janahitaṃ āsiṃsatā pūjiya;
anya-e0703n:6904_0: Tiṭṭhantaṃ sugataṃ viya’ssa munino dhātu ca sambūjaye.
anya-e0703n:6914_0: Dhātugabbhamhi kammāni, mayā niṭṭhāpi tāni hi;
anya-e0703n:6915_0: Suve dhātuṃ nidhessāmi, bhante jānātha dhātuyo”.
anya-e0703n:6917_0: Idaṃ vatvā mahārājā, nagaraṃ pāvisī tato;
anya-e0703n:6935_0: Taṃ pāpuṇitvā gaṅgāya, jalaṃ pakkhili taṃ idha;
anya-e0703n:6936_0: Bhikkhū asaddahantā taṃ, satthuno taṃ nivedayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:6944_0: Idhā’netvā dassayitvā, janassa puna taṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:6948_0: Ussāpetvāna dassetvā, janassa khipi taṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:6953_0: Iti patthayi tenetaṃ, saṅgho soṇuttaraṃ yatiṃ;
anya-e0703n:6957_0: Kathesi saṅgho therassa, tassa tā dhātuyo iti.
anya-e0703n:6963_0: Ekaṃ doṇaṃ rāmagāme, koḷiyehi ca sakkataṃ.
anya-e0703n:6965_0: Nāgalokaṃ tato nitaṃ, tato nāgehi sakkataṃ;
anya-e0703n:6986_0: Samuddaṃ pavisitvāna, dvidhā bhinne jale tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:6989_0: Nāgā disvā karaṇḍaṃ taṃ, kāḷanāgassa rājino;
anya-e0703n:6993_0: Dhātū tā abhipūjento, netvāna bhavanaṃ sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:6996_0: Māpetvā saha nāgehi, sadā pūjesi sādaro.
anya-e0703n:7001_0: Iccevaṃ saṅghavacanaṃ, sutvā sādhūti so pana;
anya-e0703n:7005_0: Cāresi nagare bheriṃ, sabba kiccaṃ vidhāya taṃ.
anya-e0703n:7020_0: Mahatā ca baloghena, hatthivā jirathehi ca.
anya-e0703n:7023_0: Āruyha surathaṃ aṭṭhā, suseta ca susindhavaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7053_0: Patvā’dhikāraṃ sabbaṃ so, saṅgha sandesa mabruvi.
anya-e0703n:7056_0: Tava hatthagatā dhātu, dehitā kira me tuvaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7058_0: Taṃ sutvā nāgarājāso, atīva domanassi to;
anya-e0703n:7076_0: Bahū devā ca nāgā ca, osariṃsu tahiṃ tadā;
anya-e0703n:7080_0: Ñatvā’naha theraṃ taṃ, dhātunatthi me santike iti.
anya-e0703n:7085_0: Aññathā saññāpetuṃ taṃ, theraṃ so uragādhipo;
anya-e0703n:7086_0: Ādāya cetiya gharaṃ, gantvā taṃ tassa vaṇṇayi.
anya-e0703n:7095_0: Dhātūnaṃ nayanaṃ nāma, nayuttaṃ bhikkhuvo idaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7103_0: Dhātunidhānaṃ ajje’va, so hi rājā karissati;
anya-e0703n:7104_0: Tasmā papañcamakaritvā, lahuṃ me dehi dhātuyo”.
anya-e0703n:7107_0: Gahetvā yāhi taṃ thero, tikkhattuṃ taṃ bhaṇāpiya.
anya-e0703n:7124_0: Bhikkhu nāgassa vijaye, tuṭṭhā devā samāgatā;
anya-e0703n:7131_0: Te tena tuṭṭhā gantvāna, pūjā bhaṇḍāni āharuṃ.
anya-e0703n:7134_0: Ādāya saha devehi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ samupāgato.
anya-e0703n:7166_0: Mātūnaṃ purato ceva, tattha tattha ca pañcasu;

anya-e0703n:7365_0: Tadā ca āharāpetvā, pahaṭṭho puñña potthakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:7366_0: Vācetuṃ lekhakaṃ āha, so taṃ vācesi potthakaṃ.

anya-e0703n:7415_0: Uposathesu divasesu, māse māse ca aṭṭhasu;
anya-e0703n:7434_0: Dinna dāna dvayaṃyeva, taṃ me hāsesi mānasaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7436_0: Taṃ sutvā abhayo thero, taṃ dānadvayameva so;
anya-e0703n:7442_0: Navannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ, datvā taṃ paribhuñji so;
anya-e0703n:7443_0: Pathavīcālako dhamma, suttathero tu taṃ pana.

anya-e0703n:7464_0: Aha mevaṃ hotu kāyo’pi, saṅghassa upakārako.
anya-e0703n:7470_0: Niṭṭhāpehi tuvaṃ sabbaṃ, kammaṃ sakkacca sādhukaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7472_0: Sāyaṃ pāto ca pupphāni, mahāthūpamhi pūjaya;
anya-e0703n:7475_0: Paṭiyāditañca yaṃ vattaṃ, mayā sugata sāsane;
anya-e0703n:7476_0: Sabbaṃ aparihāpetvā, tāta vattaya taṃ tuvaṃ.
